data.subject: Man On The Moon
data.lyric:
Oh baby, I am just a man on the moon
 I keep spinnin' in circles around you
 'Cause I've been livin'

data.subject: Heavy
data.lyric:
All of your love
 I love your love
 All of your lovin'
 I surrender
 To all of the ways
 Those wicke

data.subject: Dance
data.lyric:
Body snatchers and karma catchers
 They pitter patter through the night
 Money loving, a dime a doze
